document_data.caption: A map of Mulhorand showing Sultim in the north.
document_data.name: Sultim
document_data.mainbody: '''Sultim''' was a city located in the country of [[Mulhorand]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Sultim was located in northern Mulhorand within a region of high plains called the [[Taranoth]]. It sat along the coast of the [[Alamber Sea]] due west from the [[Ganathwood]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The precept of Sultim in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, was a [[warrior]] of [[Horus-Re]] named [[Koramon]].
document_data.Activities: Sultim was a major center of worship for [[Anhur]].
document_data.History: The armies of [[Thay]] were defeated at Sultim in their first invasion attempt in the {{YearlinkName|1098}}. Thay's second invasion in the {{YearlinkName|1280}}, resulted in their beseiging Sultim and nearly taking the city, but reinforcements arrived in time to save the city.
